name: Monster Under My Bed
description:
Hide-and-Seek with the Monster Under your Bed

Befriend Chubby Choco before he returns home!
Be careful, he scares easily! (tips below)

Made for Global Game Jam 2019.

Tips:

  • Get closer when he's calm (giggling) to pet him
  • Exclamation mark above his head = he's paranoid,  moving will scare him!

Our Motto: "A Game Made by Monsters for Monsters" 

Team:

  • Eunice Lim (me) - Design, Code
  • Kelsey Coffman - Level Design, Code,  Audio Design
  • Allyson Campos - 2D Art, 2D Animations 

Credits:

3D Art from Unity asset store
Music from FreeSounds
